      • restoreFragment

        public void restoreFragment(java.lang.String id,
                   android.support.v4.app.Fragment f)
        When Android has automatically recreated a fragment from the bundle state, use this function to 'restore' the recreated fragment into this sidebar adapter to prevent it from trying to create the same fragment again.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the fragment
        f - The fragment itself
